#summary Short instructions how to install the MetaEdit+ plugin for Eclipse

== Download and install Eclipse ==

Download [http://eclipse.org/ Eclipse]. Look for instructions on how to install Eclipse to your computer.


== Installing the plugin ==

There are two alternative ways for installing the plugin:
 * Install the plugin from update site. Open Eclipse and choose Help | Install New Software and set the update site to http://metaedit-plugin-for-eclipse.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/MEplusGraphBrowser/ and follow the instruction in the wizard.
 * Download the plugin as a single JAR-file from [http://code.google.com/p/metaedit-plugin-for-eclipse/downloads/list Downloads] page. Place it to plugins folder under Eclipse installation folder.
